talk.utter: Would you go so far as to say "if you were going to try printing a 3D camera this Mamiya design may be the one to try"? I hadn't thought about trying to print an actual camera thought I've seen plenty of clever parts for other cameras.

talk.author: did:plc:fey6feawsw644dq4ab37kdga
talk.utter: This is NOT an easy build. I think Albert did an AMAZING job with the design AND the build guide. And this is the coolest design Iâ€™ve seen by far, BUT BUT BUT it is still extremely non-trivial to build. It requires you to be pretty good at printing AND very handy with DIY electronics projects.
